select sjbh,center,t1.create_date,t1.update_date from t_sjbh t1 LEFT JOIN t_center t2 ON t1.center_id=t2.id where t1.is_valid = 1 and t2.is_valid = 1
and t2.center like '%${center}%'
ORDER by sjbh

select xybh,center,t1.create_date,t1.update_date from t_xybh t1 LEFT JOIN t_center t2 ON t1.center_id=t2.id where t1.is_valid = 1 and t2.is_valid = 1
and t2.center like '%${center}%'
ORDER by xybh
